string.name: subscriptionsData
string.instruction: First placeholder is either monthly or yearly, second is renews or expires, third is a date in format MMMM dd, yyyy

resources.string: More seamless privacy with three new protections, including:

•  VPN (Virtual Private Network)
  •  Personal Information Removal
  •  Identity Theft Restoration

Learn More
Your already had a subscription and we\'ve recovered that for you.
We couldn\'t find the subscription. Please try again.
Remove your info from sites that sell it
If your identity is stolen, we\'ll help restore it

Your subscription was purchased through the Apple App Store. To change your plan or billing settings, please go to Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions on a device signed in to the same Apple ID used to purchase your subscription.
Activate Privacy Pro on desktop to set up Personal Information Removal
In the DuckDuckGo browser for desktop, go to Settings > Privacy Pro and click I Have a Subscription to get started.
